```{r}
setwd("..")

#load train data
train <- read.csv(file="./data/kddcup.data_10_percent.csv", header = TRUE,sep=";", row.names= NULL)

#load test data
test <- read.csv(file="./data/kddcup.data_10_percent.csv", header = TRUE,sep=";", row.names= NULL)
```
```{r}
#extract features and outcome
x_train = train[c(1:41)]
y_train = train[c(42)]

x_test = test[c(1:41)]
y_test = test[c(42)]

```

```{r}
#one-hot encoding

library(ade4)
library(data.table)

#encode the symbolic features
symbolic_feats = c('protocol_type', 'service', 'flag', 'land', 'logged_in', 'is_host_login', 'is_guest_login')

for (f in symbolic_feats){
  x_train_dummy = acm.disjonctif(x_train[f])
  x_train[f] = NULL
  x_train = cbind(x_train, x_train_dummy)
}


```


